cell.mcode:
% Robust Control Toolbox 2.0.7 % for use with MATLAB 6.0 and Control System Toolbox 5.0 % or later. % % Installation: Delete current toolbox/robust directory and % replace with these updated files. % % New features: % Robust Control Toolbox functions now recognize % the following system representations: % 1) MKSYS (Robust Control Toolbox) % 2) LTI (Control Toolbox SS, TF, ZPK) % 3) PCK (MuTools Toolbox) % 4) LTISYS (LMI Toolbox) % LTI is now the preferred form for system % representation. Functions with LTI inputs % return systems in LTI form. % % New functions: % RCT2LTI converts MKSYS, PCK and LTISYS % systems to Control Toolbox LTI objects. % %
% Notice: These files may not be compatible with earlier % versions of MATLAB and Control System Toolbox %
% Richard Y. Chiang & Michael G. Safonov
% All Rights Reserved.

mwsh:code.mwsh:comments: % for use with MATLAB 6.0 and Control System Toolbox 5.0
% Installation: Delete current toolbox/robust directory and
% Robust Control Toolbox functions now recognize
% LTI is now the preferred form for system
% RCT2LTI converts MKSYS, PCK and LTISYS
% systems to Control Toolbox LTI objects.
% Notice: These files may not be compatible with earlier
% versions of MATLAB and Control System Toolbox
% Richard Y. Chiang & Michael G. Safonov

mscript.originalCode:
% Robust Control Toolbox 2.0.7 % for use with MATLAB 6.0 and Control System Toolbox 5.0 % or later. % % Installation: Delete current toolbox/robust directory and % replace with these updated files. % % New features: % Robust Control Toolbox functions now recognize % the following system representations: % 1) MKSYS (Robust Control Toolbox) % 2) LTI (Control Toolbox SS, TF, ZPK) % 3) PCK (MuTools Toolbox) % 4) LTISYS (LMI Toolbox) % LTI is now the preferred form for system % representation. Functions with LTI inputs % return systems in LTI form. % % New functions: % RCT2LTI converts MKSYS, PCK and LTISYS % systems to Control Toolbox LTI objects. % %
% Notice: These files may not be compatible with earlier % versions of MATLAB and Control System Toolbox %
% Richard Y. Chiang & Michael G. Safonov % Copyright 1988-2004 The MathWorks, Inc. % All Rights Reserved.
